short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bypass paywalls by accessing archived versions of articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to bypass paywalls with one click and read the article you want to. This extension pulls the article you are trying to read from an archive site
